{$blockTitle}

{foreach from=$OutputList item=row1 id=listLoop}

{$row1.beforeTitle}{if strlen($row1.Title) > 0}{$row1.prependTitle}{$row1.Title}{$row1.appendTitle}{/if}{$row1.afterTitle}

{if strlen($row1.Summary) > 0 || strlen($row1.Publishdate) > 0 || strlen($row1.Categories) > 0 || strlen($row1.Contenttypename) > 0 || strlen($row1.Authors) > 0}
    {$row1.beforeDetails} {$row1.beforeContenttypename}{if strlen($row1.Contenttypename) > 0}
  • {$row1.prependContenttypename}{$row1.Contenttypename}{$row1.appendContenttypename}
    • {/if}{$row1.afterContenttypename} {$row1.beforeAuthors}{if strlen($row1.Authors) > 0}
  • {$row1.prependAuthors}{$row1.Authors}{$row1.appendAuthors}
    • {/if}{$row1.afterAuthors} {$row1.beforePublishdate}{if strlen($row1.Publishdate) > 0}
  • {$row1.prependPublishdate}{$row1.Publishdate}{$row1.appendPublishdate}
    • {/if}{$row1.afterPublishdate} {$row1.beforeCategories}{if strlen($row1.Categories) > 0}
  • {$row1.prependCategories}{$row1.Categories}{$row1.appendCategories}
    • {/if}{$row1.afterCategories} {$row1.afterDetails}
{/if} {$row1.beforeSummary}{if strlen($row1.Summary) > 0}
{$row1.prependSummary}{$row1.Summary}{$row1.appendSummary}
{/if}{$row1.afterSummary}
{/foreach}
